document.full_text: eu ministers voted on friday to exempt solar panels from a ban on toxic substances in electrical goods, enabling leading maker first solar to keep selling its products in the industry's biggest market.
document.title: solar panels win reprieve in eu toxic substance ban
lines_and_colors: eu ministers voted on friday to exempt solar panels from a ban on toxic substances in electrical goods, enabling leading maker first solar to keep selling its products in the industry's biggest market.
